message.content:
cs.CV, cs.LG, cs.AI, cs.MM, cs.RO 

The paper deals with the problem of correlation filter based tracking, which is a subfield of computer vision (cs.CV). The paper proposes a joint learning approach for deep representation and model adaptation, which involves the use of an updater network. This approach involves the use of convolutional neural networks (CNNs) and truncated inference, which are both topics in machine learning (cs.LG) and artificial intelligence (cs.AI). The paper also discusses the real-time performance of the proposed method, which is relevant to robotics (cs.RO). Finally, the paper involves experiments with tracking accuracy, which is a topic in multimedia (cs.MM).
